archimate:BusinessFunction.name: BedrijfscontinuÃ¯teit en compliance borgen
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om kaders en risico's vast te stellen, te bewaken en te besturen door o.a. compliance te bewaken en policy's in te voeren. .

properties.value: The ability to establish, monitor and manage frameworks and risks by, among other things, monitoring compliance and introducing policies.
